DOC.brief_title: SoLaHmo Radio Stories About Children 's Healthy Eating Exercise
DOC.detailed_description: Given high rate type 2 diabetes mellitus ( diabetes ) minority immigrant community , implement culturally linguistically appropriate health promotion activity improve family ' diet physical activity behavior imperative . `` Radio Stories '' education entertainment strategy significant potential health promotion tool . Through CBPAR process , aim create test effectiveness acceptability `` SoLaHmo Radio Stories '' change knowledge behavior prevent manage diabetes Somali , Latino , Hmong family . Methods : SoLaHmo community researcher interview 3 family ( 1 Somali , 1 Latino , 1 Hmong ) successfully implement lifestyle change prevent manage diabetes , create 3 `` radio story '' base family ' experience . To test story , conduct two-arm trial include intervention group ( 20 people per community ) listen radio story control group ( 20 people per community ) receive brochure similar information ( N=120 ) . Effectiveness acceptability program test pre-and post questionnaire . Anticipated Results : Higher rate satisfaction , increase knowledge , intention change participant receive radio story , compare control group participant , indicate radio story program effectiveness acceptability .
